meanings.sent1: The amontillados were carefully stored in the cellar.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy sipping on amontillados during special occasions.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone wanted a taste of the rare amontillados.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the aged amontillados filled the room with warmth.
meanings.sent5: The sommelier recommended pairing the dish with a glass of amontillados.

meanings.sent1: The cellar was filled with rows of amontillados.
meanings.sent2: The collection of amontillados was impressive.
meanings.sent3: The amontillados seemed to whisper stories of their origins.
meanings.sent4: Among the dusty bottles, the amontillados stood out like treasures.
meanings.sent5: The party guests marveled at the display of colorful amontillados.
